panels.content: Previous week
Previous month
Previous year
Last 2 years (monthly)
Merged Pull Requests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'w'
GROUP by
  1

SELECT
  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'm'
GROUP by
  1

SELECT
  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'y'
GROUP by
  1

SELECT
  $__time(time),
  proposed_by,
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'm'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'w'
GROUP by
  1

  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'm'
GROUP by
  1

  $__time(time),
  sum(merged)
FROM
  pr_activity
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  repo = 'grafana/grafana' AND
  period = 'y'
GROUP by
